name: Faye Valentine (Cowboy Bebop)
description:
V3 Description

I got pretty lucky with this version because I expected to spend more time on it but the first time I trained turned out with great quality. I trained it one more time hoping to fix some minor issues, but turns out it's better to quit while ahead.

Prompt for main outfit is faye valentine, yellow hairband, yellow crop top, red shirt, off shoulder, tied shirt, suspenders, midriff, yellow shorts, thighhighs, high heel boots. Some poses with red jacket might be problematic because it sometimes becomes obvious that parts around arms and parts around chest are not connected. Adding long sleeves can help a bit then. Also if doing open top like I did on second image use open clothes, open shirt and put red shirt, off shoulder, tied shirt into negatives. that helps not just with the shirt, but also separates in middle way better.

Prompt for bikini is faye valentine, eyewear on head, sunglasses, two-tone bikini, o-ring bikini, bracelet. It's still not consistent but good improvement over previous version.

V2 Description

Lora model for Faye Valentine from Cowboy Bebop. Weight worked best for me at around 0.75.

I'm quite happy with this one. It's v2 because in first version that I made I saw getting the red jacket on and off was pretty lackluster. I decided to put more effort into tagging and the result is while use of model requires more description, control over outfit works consistently. I feel it's probably the easiest to get nice pics with this one out of all of my models so far :D

Use faye valentine in prompt for the character. Tags yellow shirt, yellow shorts, suspenders, white footwear, thighhighs will get you outfit without jacket (through how much from it you need depends on you image). For jacket add red jacket, off shoulder. Model still occasionally struggle with the way she usually wear the jacket. Sometimes you can get one jacket tied at waist and second one on arms. That's some warm & stylish 4d-chess, through not much desired here.

There were some singular images of her swimsuit in the dataset, so if you instead do swimsuit, bikini, highleg, you have a chance to get half white half black swimsuit.
